channel.title: Looking for beta testers/helpers/coder/ ect
channel.description:
[center][b]ABOUT:[/b][/center] [center]My server is an oldschool server 2007 based. NOT OSRS, before all that. I'm trying to make it an enjoyable experience for everyone. Xp rates are slow but not too slow and there's bosses and minigames. Very similar to most servers. I need help with unique ideas and implementing them into the server. My source is up and running and I need committed people who are passionate about oldschool servers. My goal isn't to make this a money maker server, but for players to enjoy and stay a while, not just hop on and leave.[/center]
[center]I need 1 client developer, 1 server developer and multiple beta testers 4-6[/center]
When you add me on Skype message me the following [spoiler]Position desired, experience, name, age[/spoiler] If you're interested my Skype is server.help1

item.title: Looking for beta testers/helpers/coder/ ect
item.dc:creator: @Basix Basix
item.description:
@Basix wrote:

I’d love to be a tester! ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for beta testers/helpers/coder/ ect
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

I sent you a message on skype. I have been around since early 2008 and i like to beta test games in general and private servers as well. I’ve tested some games that have been testing out a few over seas game here recently i have been testing out a private server based around zardwars using updated code and classic rips. i quit playing triad wars the closed beta.

I would happily test out your server.

Read full topic

[center]My server is an oldschool server 2007 based. NOT OSRS, before all that. I’m trying to make it an enjoyable experience for everyone.
